About Me

I am a beginner Front-End Developer and I spent my last year working on developing my skills. I am motivated to work in the IT area and be able to work on real projects. I am fascinated by creating projects based on programming languages that I have met. Moreover, I am very focused on the development and learning of new technologies, I am not afraid of criticism and work on myself.
